    Multiple history workflow

    multiple_history.Rmd

    Setting up

    Below is an example of a more complicated workflow, starting from a multiple input files, to be used as an example of a full rtrackr workflow.

    We will define and log simple dataframes for this example. For more information, please see Getting started.

    trackr_dir <- '~/Documents/Personal/trackr_dev/trackr_dir'

df1 <- data.frame(a = c('a', 'b', 'c'), b = c(1, 2, 3))
df2 <- data.frame(a = c('a', 'b', 'c'), b = c(4, 5, 6))
    Details 1df1
    a b
    a 1
    b 2
    c 3
    Details 2df2
    a b
    a 4
    b 5
    c 6 
    df1 <- trackr_new(df1, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Start')
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9_dl.json"
    df2 <- trackr_new(df2, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'Start')
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48_dl.json"
    Details 1df1
    a b trackr_id
    a 1 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9_4751028c3d830cf93f7d1e64d5e4d58c9d01ee32
    b 2 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9_d6543aeb67806714fa9e9567dc5c46b2106ae843
    c 3 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9_acecf5a5dfb445683737c2f7f135b18c5eaee1a7
    Details 2df2
    a b trackr_id
    a 4 b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48_47ed5196677a528d0267158fa4aecf92372cb285
    b 5 b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48_b845cb31be54e58d8719cbb88ea27d51f1a2df1c
    c 6 b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48_d407e3ee6c77faa4ed4ffe31fa434f326ff9ddbe

    Workflow

    df <- rbind(df1, df2)

df <- df %>% dplyr::group_by(a) %>%
  trackr_summarise(n = dplyr::n())
    ## Joining, by = "a"
    Details
    a n trackr_id
    a 2 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9_4751028c3d830cf93f7d1e64d5e4d58c9d01ee32, b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48_47ed5196677a528d0267158fa4aecf92372cb285
    b 2 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9_d6543aeb67806714fa9e9567dc5c46b2106ae843, b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48_b845cb31be54e58d8719cbb88ea27d51f1a2df1c
    c 2 7462f7ae9081a478a12bd45e588c02733f644be9_acecf5a5dfb445683737c2f7f135b18c5eaee1a7, b777148733c3c6976f9e5d6f98b58c3895063b48_d407e3ee6c77faa4ed4ffe31fa434f326ff9ddbe 
    df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'processing 1')
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file 7397f2eaad4320bb27e19e3d200b84c25aec7135.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log 7397f2eaad4320bb27e19e3d200b84c25aec7135_dl.json"
    Details
    a n trackr_id
    a 2 7397f2eaad4320bb27e19e3d200b84c25aec7135_9b298ab2c9539c0d7f187ce26315f459fa58e78e
    b 2 7397f2eaad4320bb27e19e3d200b84c25aec7135_d6543aeb67806714fa9e9567dc5c46b2106ae843
    c 2 7397f2eaad4320bb27e19e3d200b84c25aec7135_c7a74dd8ad5c5743a5983d3102600cc7f9df9370 
    df <- df %>%
  dplyr::mutate(n = n + 20)

df <- trackr_timepoint(df, trackr_dir = trackr_dir, timepoint_message = 'processing 1')
    ## [1] "Successfully written trackr file 5e06d5e79bea7f215e6e3cfcfcda1b4b3f2f6e14.json"
## [1] "Successfully written trackr data log 5e06d5e79bea7f215e6e3cfcfcda1b4b3f2f6e14_dl.json"
    Details
    a n trackr_id
    a 22 5e06d5e79bea7f215e6e3cfcfcda1b4b3f2f6e14_68c5ca73812a80a8ef11cbd4150ca48d1f956ec1
    b 22 5e06d5e79bea7f215e6e3cfcfcda1b4b3f2f6e14_15286b997ca4ef9b34614bc77265b1f529295a5e
    c 22 5e06d5e79bea7f215e6e3cfcfcda1b4b3f2f6e14_6e894e5f35b10a1e3b36eec46f595b65f28c8905

    Results

    Inspect the full processing chain of a single record with trackr_lineage() and trackr_network(). Note that this record has two “root” records (it is the child of two starting points in the processing chain).

    target_id <- df$trackr_id[1]
trackr_lineage(target_id, trackr_dir)
    ## [1] "Successfully written 5e06d5e79bea7f215e6e3cfcfcda1b4b3f2f6e14_68c5ca73812a80a8ef11cbd4150ca48d1f956ec1_lineage.json"
    lineage_fn <- paste0(trackr_dir, '/', target_id, '_lineage.json')

trackr_network(lineage_fn)

    Clean up

    clean_trackr_dir(trackr_dir)
